section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on June 26, 2022.*
section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2(b) of Urban Forest Preservation Stop Work Order Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-351, Mar. 28, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
